sys_script_include.name: getFaculty

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_29fa40fddb170010281270e23996191e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_331786_proj_tt.getFaculty</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>getFaculty</name><script><![CDATA[var getFaculty = Class.create();
getFaculty.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	Faculty:function(current){
		var sc=current.variable.stream_sel;
		var applicationList= '';
		var gr=new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_faculty');
		gr.addQuery('stream',sc);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next()) {


              if (applicationList.length > 0) {
                      applicationList+= (',' + gr.sys_id).toString();


              }


              else {


                      applicationList= gr.sys_id.toString();


              }


      }


      // return a list of card category available


      return 'sys_idIN' + applicationList;


	},

    type: 'getFaculty'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-02 11:40:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>29fa40fddb170010281270e23996191e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getFaculty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project-Time Table Management System" source="x_331786_proj_tt">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Project-Time Table Management System">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29fa40fddb170010281270e23996191e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-02 12:04:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
